short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Research Alts assists students and researchers by continuing the search and providing additional queries even if a website is down.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Assists with researching by providing alternate search queries if a website is down or temporarily unavailable.
